mapper.sql: a.id, a.user_id, b.mobile, b.nickname as "userName", a.invoice_type, a.head_content, a.tax_num, a.account_holder, a.bank_name, a.bank_no, a.phone, a.address, a.invoice_amount, a.invoice_content, a.recipients_name, a.recipients_phone, a.recipients_address, a.shipping_code, a.shipping_time, a.shipping_name, a.invoice_status, a.create_by, a.create_date, a.update_by, a.update_date, a.remarks, a.del_flag
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM mtmydb.mtmy_order_invoice a LEFT JOIN mtmydb.mtmy_users b ON a.user_id=b.user_id WHERE a.id=#{id}

SELECT
FROM mtmydb.mtmy_order_invoice a LEFT JOIN mtmydb.mtmy_users b ON a.user_id=b.user_id WHERE 1=1 and a.del_flag=0
AND b.nickname like '%'||#{userName}||'%' CONCAT('%', #{userName} , '%')
AND b.mobile like '%'||#{mobile}||'%' CONCAT('%', #{mobile} , '%')
AND a.invoice_type = #{invoiceType}
ORDER BY a.create_date DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO mtmydb.mtmy_order_invoice ( user_id, invoice_type, head_content, tax_num, bank_name, bank_no, phone, address, invoice_amount, invoice_content, recipients_name, recipients_phone, recipients_address, create_date, update_by )VALUES( #{userid}, #{invoiceType}, #{headContent}, #{taxNum}, #{bankName}, #{bankNo}, #{invoicePhone}, #{invoiceAddress}, #{invoiceAmount}, #{invoiceContent}, #{recipientsName}, #{recipientsPhone}, #{recipientsAddress}, SYSDATE(), #{createBy.id} )
mapper.update: UPDATE mtmydb.mtmy_order_invoice SET invoice_type=#{invoiceType}, head_content=#{headContent}, tax_num=#{taxNum}, bank_name=#{bankName}, bank_no=#{bankNo}, phone=#{phone}, address=#{address}, invoice_status=#{invoiceStatus}, account_holder=#{accountHolder}, invoice_amount=#{invoiceAmount}, invoice_content=#{invoiceContent}, recipients_name=#{recipientsName}, recipients_phone=#{recipientsPhone}, recipients_address=#{recipientsAddress} WHERE id=#{id}
mapper.select: SELECT a.id AS eId, a.create_date AS receiptsDate, a.tax_num AS buyTaxNo, a.bank_no AS buyBankNo, c.goods_name AS shopName, c.spec_key_name AS specKeyName, c.goods_num AS goodsNum, c.total_amount AS totalAmount, c.goods_price AS goodsPrice FROM mtmydb.mtmy_order_invoice a LEFT JOIN mtmydb.mtmy_order_invoice_relevancy b ON b.invoice_id = a.id LEFT JOIN mtmydb.mtmy_order_goods_mapping c ON b.order_id = c.order_id WHERE a.del_flag = 0
SELECT DISTINCT a.order_id FROM mtmydb.mtmy_order_invoice_relevancy a WHERE a.invoice_id = #{invoiceId}

SELECT a.order_id AS orderid, IFNULL(ogd.order_arrearage,0) AS orderArrearage, (CASE WHEN DATE_FORMAT(IFNULL(a.invoice_overtime,SYSDATE()),'%Y-%m-%d') <= DATE_FORMAT(SYSDATE(),'%Y-%m-%d') THEN '1' ELSE '2' END) AS isInvoice FROM mtmydb.mtmy_orders a LEFT JOIN (SELECT SUM(order_arrearage) AS order_arrearage,order_id FROM mtmydb.mtmy_order_goods_details GROUP BY order_id) ogd ON a.order_id = ogd.order_id WHERE a.user_id = #{userId} AND a.order_status = 4 AND a.is_neworder = 0 HAVING orderarrearage = 0 ORDER BY a.order_id DESC

SELECT DISTINCT a.order_id AS orderid FROM mtmydb.mtmy_order_invoice_relevancy a LEFT JOIN mtmydb.mtmy_order_goods_mapping b ON a.mapping_id = b.rec_id LEFT JOIN mtmydb.mtmy_goods c ON b.goods_id = c.goods_id WHERE b.user_id = #{userId} GROUP BY a.order_id DESC

SELECT a.order_id AS orderid, a.mapping_id AS recid, b.original_img AS originalimg, b.goods_name AS goodsname, b.goods_price AS goodsprice, SUM(a.open_num) AS openNum, TRUNCATE(b.total_amount/b.goods_num,2) AS unitPrice FROM mtmydb.mtmy_order_invoice_relevancy a LEFT JOIN mtmydb.mtmy_order_goods_mapping b ON a.mapping_id = b.rec_id WHERE a.order_id = #{orderId} GROUP BY a.order_id, a.mapping_id

SELECT a.order_id AS orderid, a.rec_id AS recid, a.original_img AS originalimg, a.goods_name AS goodsname, a.goods_price AS goodsprice,
(CASE WHEN (a.goods_num - IFNULL((SELECT SUM(open_num) FROM mtmydb.mtmy_order_invoice_relevancy WHERE mapping_id = a.rec_id),0)) >= (a.goods_num - IFNULL((SELECT SUM(return_num) FROM mtmydb.mtmy_returned_goods WHERE goods_mapping_id = a.rec_id AND return_status IN (11,12,13,14,15,16)),0)) THEN (a.goods_num - IFNULL((SELECT SUM(return_num) FROM mtmydb.mtmy_returned_goods WHERE goods_mapping_id = a.rec_id AND return_status IN (11,12,13,14,15,16)),0)) ELSE (a.goods_num - IFNULL((SELECT SUM(open_num) FROM mtmydb.mtmy_order_invoice_relevancy WHERE mapping_id = a.rec_id),0)) END) AS openNum, TRUNCATE(a.total_amount/a.goods_num,2) AS unitPrice FROM mtmydb.mtmy_order_goods_mapping a WHERE order_id = #{orderId} HAVING openNum > 0
